overview:
Passionate about building exceptional products, platforms and ideas, and pushing the envelope on what can be achieved through technology. Bootstrapper, willing to radically shift direction if the need arises and always engaged. Constantly testing and challenging assumptions.

Founded DynamiX Web Design in 2005, co-founded Think App Studio and Home Elephant, a neighborhood-based social media platform. In its first year alone, Home Elephant has grown to over 6,400 neighborhoods around the world and 80 countries.

Home Elephant is currently a part of Georgia Tech’s Flashpoint accelerator program.

Work has been featured prominently by Fast Company, Adweek, Fox News, CNN, The Wall Street Journal, Huffington Post, ABC News, The Next Web, Time Magazine, The Atlanta Journal Constitution, GOOD, The Unofficial Apple Weblog, Comedy Central, CBS’ The Early Show, and many more. Each year, websites created by Jeff and his company are viewed by millions of visitors.

Jeff is a yearly speaker at the Campbell School of Business, and mentors entrepreneurial students who have launched their own businesses.
